data.text: Luvutudila Yave matondo bila niandi widi wumboti ;
Bika bobo bakulu kuidi Yave batuba buawu ;
bobo kakutikisa tona ku mintoto,
Bankaka baba diengilanga mu dikanga, buangu bikambulu batu ;
Bamona nzala ayi phuila ;
Buna bayamikina kuidi Yave mu ziphasi ziawu
Niandi wuba diatisa mu nzila yisonga
Bika bavutudila Yave matondo mu diambu di luzolo luandi lu ngolo
Bila wumanisa phuila
Bankaka baba vuandanga mu tombi ayi ku tsi tombi ki nkobo ;
Bila batinguna mambu ma Nzambi,
Diawu kaba yekudila ku tsi kisalu ki ngolo ;
Buna bayamikina kuidi Yave mu ziphasi ziawu
Wuba totula mu tombi ayi ku tsi tombi ki nkobo
Bika bavutudila Yave matondo mu diambu di luzolo luandi lu ngolo
Bila wutiolumuna mielo mi palata
Bankaka bakituka bivungisi mu zinzila ziawu zi matingu
Bakakumukina bidia bioso
Buna bayamikina kuidi Yave mu ziphasi ziawu
Wufidisa mambu mandi ayi wuba belusa,
Bika bavutudila Yave matondo mu diambu di luzolo luandi lu ngolo
Bika batambika makaba ma phutudulu matondo
Bankaka bayendila va mbu mu masuwa,
bamona bisalu bi Yave,
Bila wuyoluka ayi wutotula vuka kingolo,
Bakuma ku yilu ayi bakuluka ti kuna tsi ;
Balembo balumuka ayi bulangana mu diata banga batu bakololo malavu
Buna bayamikina kuidi Yave mu ziphasi ziawu
Wudigimisa vuka kingolo mu manuinguta,
Bamona khini thangu ndembama yivutuka
Bika bavutudila Yave matondo mu diambu di luzolo luandi lu ngolo
Bika banyayisa mu lukutukunu lu batu
Wukitula minlangu minneni makanga
ayi ntoto widi mbozi mu ntoto widi tsalu
Wukitula dikanga mu bibuindi bi nlangu
Kuna kanata nzala muingi yizingila
Bakuna zitsola ayi zindima zi vinu
Wuba sakumuna ayi thalu awu yiwombo yi buelama
Buna thalu awu yidekuka ayi bafua tsoni
Niandi wulembo lenzi batu banneni,
Vayi weti totula nsukami mu ziphasi ziandi
Batu balulama mu mintima balembo moni ayi balembo yangalala
Woso mutu widi nduenga bika kakeba mambu mama
